headings.usage: Main headings, Section titles, KPI values

mono.usage: Code snippets, Data tables, Technical metrics

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body

primary.description: International Klein Blue variant - High Energy & Trust

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A)
Primary color ONLY for main CTAs and active states
Text on colored backgrounds must meet APCA contrast standards
Gradients: Subtle noise/grain only, no full-screen smooth gradients

marketing.name: Tetris Grid (Mode A)
marketing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Mix col-span-8 (Hero) with col-span-4 (Detail).

dashboard.name: High Density Grid (Mode B)
dashboard.rules: Dense packing. Widgets must stretch (h-full). No jagged bottoms.

customization_rules: Border Radius: rounded-lg (0.5rem) for cards, rounded-full for buttons
Shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for hover states
Glassmorphism: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md (Light) for sticky headers/overlays. NEVER transparent.

specific_overrides.Card: Flat style, 1px border, no shadow by default. Hover: lift + shadow.
specific_overrides.Button: Pill-shaped or slightly rounded (rounded-md). High contrast.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on solid backgrounds to prevent 'digital flatness'

hero_background.usage: Landing page hero background with overlay

features_team.alt: Two professionals analyzing data at a desk
features_team.usage: Features section or 'About' area to show human element

placeholders.chart: Use Recharts for actual data visualization. Do not use static images for charts in dashboard.

universal_guidelines: All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute (kebab-case)
Do not use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Do not center align the app container globally.
Export components as named exports, Pages as default exports.
File extensions: Use .js and .jsx (Project is JS-based).
Ensure Dark Mode support via 'dark' class strategy in Tailwind.
instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' archetype. Prioritize data clarity. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page. Build the dashboard using the 'High Density' grid strategy. Ensure all text has sufficient contrast. Use Shadcn components for interactive elements but style them to match the 'Manrope/Public Sans' typography system.
